vote.title: Reappointment of Member to the School Construction Bond Citizens’ Oversight Committee (Sobalvarro) (Sup Res 007-21/22)
vote.description: Resolved, That the Governing Board of the Los Angeles Unified School District ratifies the reappointment of Ms. Dolores Sobalvarro, representing the AARP California, as Member to the School Construction Bond Citizens’ Oversight Committee for a two-year term commencing September 14, 2021.  Ms. Sobalvarro is not employee, official, vendor, contractor, or consultant of the District.
